full_strength.text:
prepare solution of (_amount_) mg (_amount_ml_) ml with (_ns_amount_) ml of 0.9% NS 
 (20mcg/Kg/ml)

double_strength.text:
prepare solution of (_amount_) mg (_amount_ml_) ml with (_ns_amount_) ml of 0.9% NS 
 (40mcg/Kg/ml)

half_strength.text:
prepare solution of (_amount_) mg (_amount_ml_) ml with (_ns_amount_) mL of 0.9% NS 
 (10mcg/Kg/ml)

formula_50ml.single_strength:
prepare solution of (500mcg) 10ml of Fentanyl with 40 ml of 0.9% NS 
 (10mcg/ml)
formula_50ml.double_strength:
prepare solution of (1000mcg) 20 ml of Fentanyl with 30 ml of 0.9% NS 
 (20mcg/ml)

formula_50ml.minimum_strength: prepare solution of (1mg) 1ml of Remifentanil in 49ml of 0.9% NS (20mcg/ml)
formula_50ml.maximum_strength: prepare solution of (5mg) 5ml of Remifentanil in 45ml of 0.9% NS (250mcg/ml)

formula_50ml.single_strength:
prepare solution of (50mg) 10ml of Midazolam with 40 ml of 0.9% NS 
 (1mg/ml)
formula_50ml.double_strength:
prepare solution of (100mg) 20 ml of Midazolam with 30 ml of 0.9% NS 
 (2mg/ml)

formula_50ml.single_strength:
prepare solution of (200mcg) 2ml of Dexmedetomidine with 48 ml of 0.9% NS 
 (4mg/ml)
formula_50ml.double_strength:
prepare solution of (400mg) 4ml of Midazolam with 46 ml of 0,9%NS 
 (8mg/ml)

formula_50ml.single_strength:
prepare solution of (50mg) 5ml of Rocuronium with 45 ml of 0.9% NS 
 (1mg/ml)
formula_50ml.maximum_strength:
prepare solution of (250mg) 25ml of Rocuronium with 25ml of 0.9% NS
 (5mg/ml)

formula_50ml.single_strength:

 (1mcg/ml)

prepare solution of (50mg) 1ml of ketamine with 49 ml of 0.9% NS 
 (1mg/ml)
